```{r}
RME_norm <- function(..., size){lapply(X = rep(N, size), FUN = RM_norm, ...)}
RME_norm(N = 3, size = 2)
ensemble <- RME("norm",c(N = 20, 0, 1, F, T, T), ensemble_size = 1000)
spectrum(ensemble)
spectrum_plot(ensemble)
```

```{r}
# Function factor for RME_ functions.
RME_constructor <- function(RM_matrix){
  function(N, ..., size){lapply(X = rep(N, size), FUN = RM_matrix, ...)}
}
```
